post.author: Admin
post.title: Reminders from the Uniform Committee
post.description:
Band Families,
Our first football game is coming up, and we wanted to remind you of a few thing
post.content:
Band Families,

Our first football game is coming up, and we wanted to remind you of a few things.

  1. If your uniform pants need to be hemmed or let down, the alterations must be done before the first football game on August 29th.
  2. Raincoats need to be Scotchgarded. The seams are not waterproof.
  3. Please see the Uniform Care information document for more useful information. It is located on the booster website, www.northroyaltonbandboosters.com, under Band and then Band Documents.

Thanks!
